segments.text: What a delightful little scene this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are having such fun sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's all stretched out on his stool, grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl's right there, excited for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so coordinated in their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's full—plenty for both.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s busy drying dishes, giving them space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Though the sink's overflowing, it's kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water making a little river on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view adds a sunny vibe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how carefree childhood can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hope they enjoy those cookies before she notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This brings a smile to my face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Pure joy in the everyday chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
